mapper.select:
SELECT priv.code,priv.name from TstOrgPrivilegeDefine priv
join TstOrgRolePrivilegeRelation r_role_priv ON r_role_priv.orgPrivilegeId=priv.id join TstOrgRoleUserRelation r_role_user ON r_role_user.orgRoleId=r_role_priv.orgRoleId join TstOrgRole org_role ON r_role_user.orgRoleId=org_role.id
where r_role_user.userId = #{userId} AND org_role.orgId=#{orgId} AND priv.deleted != true and priv.disabled!= true order by priv.id asc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TstOrgRolePrivilegeRelation WHERE orgId=#{orgId} AND orgRoleId=#{roleId}
DELETE FROM TstOrgRolePrivilegeRelation WHERE orgId=#{orgId} AND orgPrivilegeId=#{privilegeId}
